    public class SCUIHeaderValueRuleRegistry

      • addRule

        public void addRule(ISCValidationRule rule)
        Description copied from interface: ISCRuleRegistry
        Adds a rule to the registry. If the rule name is ISCValidationRule#RULE_NAME_DEFAULT then the rule should be added as a default rule. And if the rule name is ISCValidationRule#RULE_NAME_GLOBAL then the rule should be added as a global rule. rule
        Specified by:
        addRule in interface ISCRuleRegistry
        Overrides:
        addRule in class SCDefaultRuleRegistry

      • getRules

        public java.util.ArrayList<ISCValidationRule> getRules(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: ISCRuleRegistry
        Returns list of registered rule which have passed name.
        Note: This method does not return global or default rules.

        This method never returns null. If no rules are found, empty array list is returned.

        name list containing validation rules
        Specified by:
        getRules in interface ISCRuleRegistry
        Overrides:
        getRules in class SCDefaultRuleRegistry

        public void removeRules(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: ISCRuleRegistry
        Removes all rules registered with given name. This method does not remove global or default rules. name name of the rules which need to be removed.
        Specified by:

        public void addRule(ISCValidationRuleKey key,
                    ISCValidationRule rule)
        Description copied from interface: ISCRuleRegistry
        Adds a rule to the registry. This rule would be retrievable with the similar key (equals and same hashCode) using #getRules(ISCValidationRuleKey) method. key rule
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        addRule in class SCDefaultRuleRegistry

      • getRules

        public java.util.ArrayList<ISCValidationRule> getRules(ISCValidationRuleKey key)
        Description copied from interface: ISCRuleRegistry
        Returns list of rules which were registered with the similar key (equals and same hashCode).

        Rules are kept in a HashMap so any two keys which are equal and return same hashCode will retrieve same rules. This allows fetching a validation rule with duplicate keys.

        This method never returns null. If no rules are found, empty array list is returned.

        key list containing validation rules which were registered with a the similar key (equals and same hashCode)
        Specified by:
        getRules in interface ISCRuleRegistry
        Overrides:
        getRules in class SCDefaultRuleRegistry

      • removeRules

        public void removeRules(ISCValidationRuleKey key)
        Description copied from interface: ISCRuleRegistry
        Removes all rules registered with given key. key key for the rules which need to be removed.
        Specified by:
        removeRules in interface ISCRuleRegistry
        Overrides:
        removeRules in class SCDefaultRuleRegistry
